title: Ae/Pr/Vegas/达芬奇/Nuke/OFX蓝宝石插件 GenArts Sapphire v8.1（Win64）
author: 大众脸
content: GenArts Sapphire v8.1 是一款功能强大的视觉特效插件，适用于 Adobe After Effects、Premiere Pro、Nuke、DaVinci Resolve、Sony Vegas Pro 等主流视频后期软件。该版本支持 Win64 系统，提供超过 255 个特效工具，涵盖调整、模糊锐化、合成、变形、光照、渲染、风格化、时间处理及转场等类别。新版本引入 LightLeak（炫光）、Grunge（纹理）、Shake（抖动）、DigitalDamage（信号故障）、Crosshatch（线条素描）等全新效果，并优化了预设管理与界面体验。插件以卓越的图像质量与高效渲染性能著称，深受后期制作爱好者欢迎。官方已修复多项关键问题，包括项目损坏、内存泄漏、参数重置及 GPU 兼容性问题。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS6, CC, CC 2014 (v8.1 not supported); Adobe Premiere Pro CS6, CC, CC 2014; The Foundry Nuke; Blackmagic DaVinci Resolve; China Digital Video DX / EX (Windows); FilmLight Baselight; Eyeon Fusion64 (Windows); Sony Vegas Pro (Windows)

download_links.name: 蓝宝石插件 GenArts Sapphire v8.1 (Win64)

release_notes: After updating to this release, S_Effect instances containing Beauty, LightLeak, Grunge, or others may have a color parameter reset.
Fixed a bug in S_Effect that could corrupt AE projects on some machines.
Reduced intensity of some Swish3D presets to speed up renders and avoid Windows GPU driver issues.
Builder: fixed a bug where saved presets sometimes did not show up in the Preset Browser.
Fixed license activation problems on Mac.
VintageColor2Strip: improved results when Red Filter or Bluegreen Filter is set to black.
Fixed a memory leak in Builder.
FlickerMchMatteColor: fixed Set Hold Level button for certain types of match inputs.
GradientMulti now handles pixel aspect ratio correctly.
BleachBypass: Fixed incorrect renders when GrainAmpRed was set to zero.
Caustics: fixed artifacts at the edge of the image when using a custom Bumps pattern
